General.Name: Bank of Lanzhou Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Bank of Lanzhou Co., Ltd. provides a range of banking products and services in China. It accepts corporate and personal deposits; and provides personal loans and advances, housing mortgages, operating loans, consumer loans, and business loans and advances; leasing services; wealth management services; and custody services. It also offers online, telephone, mobile, VTM remote video, and other electronic banking services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, China.
